Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

In versions past I had gotten used to using the Astronomer's Pack of mods to make KSP look absolutely gorgeous, however that seems to have not been updated in a while. I want to play the latest version of KSP, however, to me it feels too ugly XD

I wonder if you guys can point me in the direction of some mods that improve the graphics of the game (clouds, lighting, that kind of thing) or whichever you use? I realise that its still to early to expect every mod to be up to KSP 1.0 standard, so any active, still being worked on mods would be great!

Thanks in advance guys!

well I use [Enviromental Visual Enhancements](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55905-0-24-7-4-Sep-9-2014-EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements), [Planet Shine](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/96497), [Distant Objet Enhancements](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/98943) and [Hot Rockets](http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods/220207-hotrockets-particle-fx-replacement/files/2236411) and works fine to me in 1.2. the graphics are beautiful with this mods

I installed the same as CosmoBro minus the HotRockets as well as parts of Astronomers pack for E.V.E (medium res clouds, dust storms for Duna and 4k clouds for Eve and Jool) and using A.T.M and -force-opengl I still load up at less than 2gb. They were all installed via ckan.
